00099 bool Builder_graphs::compute_dependency_graphs()
00100 {
00101         const map<unsigned short,Rule> &rules(attr_grammar.get_rules());
00102 
00103         Graph current_p_Dp_graph;
00104         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::type leafs(get(vertex_data_t(), current_p_Dp_graph));
00105 
00106         /* For the rules. */
00107         for(map<unsigned short,Rule>::const_iterator it(rules.begin()); it != rules.end(); it++)
00108         {
00109                 const Rule *rule(&it->second);
00110                 /* For the eqs. */
00111                 for(map<unsigned short,Equation>::const_iterator eq(rule->get_eqs().begin()); eq != rule->get_eqs().end(); eq++)
00112                 /* For each instance build a new edge entre left instance and rigth instance. */
00113                 {
00114                         /* Insert left instance. */
00115                         vector<const Expr_leaf*> elem_leaf_tree;
00116                         eq->second.inorder_only_leaf(eq->second.get_r_value(), elem_leaf_tree);
00117 
00118                         /* Verify if vertex belong at graph. */
00119                         Vertex l_v(return_vertex(current_p_Dp_graph, eq->second.get_l_value()));
00120                         if (l_v == USHRT_MAX)
00121                         {
00122                                 /* The vertex is new in the graph. */
00123                                 l_v = add_vertex(current_p_Dp_graph);
00124                                 put(leafs, l_v, eq->second.get_l_value());
00125                         }
00126                         /* For the right side of equation. */
00127                         for(size_t i(0); i< elem_leaf_tree.size(); i++)
00128                         {
00129                                 /* Verify if vertex belong at graph. */
00130                                 Vertex r_v(return_vertex(current_p_Dp_graph,elem_leaf_tree[i]));
00131                                 if (r_v == USHRT_MAX)
00132                                 {
00133                                         /* The vertex is new in the graph. */
00134                                         r_v = add_vertex(current_p_Dp_graph);
00135                                         put(leafs,r_v,elem_leaf_tree[i]);
00136                                 }
00137                                 /* Add edge between left instance and right instance. r_v --> l_v. */
00138                                 add_edge(r_v,l_v,current_p_Dp_graph);
00139                         }
00140                 }
00141                 /* Insert current graph in map of denpendency graph. */
00142                 pair<unsigned short, Graph > new_p(rule->key(), current_p_Dp_graph);
00143                 p_Dp_graphs.insert(new_p);
00144                 current_p_Dp_graph.clear();
00145         }
00146         return true;
00147 }

00155 void Builder_graphs::compute_attr_vertex()
00156 {
00157         const map<string, Symbol> &symbols(attr_grammar.get_non_terminal_symbols());
00158 
00159         Graph current_graph;
00160         /* For all symbol. */
00161         for(map<string,Symbol >::const_iterator s_it(symbols.begin()); s_it != symbols.end(); s_it++)
00162         {
00163                 property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::type props_down(get(vertex_data_t(), current_graph));
00164                 Expr_instance ins;
00165                 ins.set_symb(&s_it->second);
00166                 /* For all symbol's attributes */
00167                 for (size_t i(0); i < s_it->second.get_attrs().size(); i++)
00168                 {
00169                         ins.set_num(0);
00170                         ins.set_attr(s_it->second.get_attrs()[i]);
00171                         /* For all dp graph*/
00172                         for(map<unsigned short,Graph >::const_iterator dp(p_Dp_graphs.begin()); dp != p_Dp_graphs.end(); dp++)
00173                         {
00174                                 Vertex node(return_vertex(dp->second, &ins));
00175                                 if (node != USHRT_MAX)
00176                                 {
00177                                         /* The vertex is new in the graph. */
00178                                         Vertex node_down(add_vertex(current_graph));
00179                                         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::const_type props_dp(get(vertex_data_t(), dp->second));
00180                                         put(props_down, node_down, props_dp[node]);
00181                                         break;
00182                                 }
00183                         }
00184                 }
00185                 /* Insert current graph in map of down graph. */
00186                 pair<string, Graph > new_p(s_it->second.key(), current_graph);
00187                 attr_vertex_graphs.insert(new_p);
00188 
00189                 current_graph.clear();
00190         }
00191 }

00201 bool Builder_graphs::compute_down_graph()
00202 {
00203         const map<unsigned short,Rule> &rules(attr_grammar.get_rules());
00204 
00205         compute_attr_vertex();
00206 
00207         complete_dp_graphs();
00208 
00209         /* Insert current graph in map of down graph. */
00210         for(map<string,Graph >::iterator attr_it(attr_vertex_graphs.begin()); attr_it != attr_vertex_graphs.end(); attr_it++)
00211         {
00212                 pair<string, Graph > new_p(attr_it->first, attr_it->second);
00213                 p_Down_graphs.insert(new_p);
00214         }
00215 
00216         /* In this point obtains the all initialiced downs. */
00217         Graph current_graph;
00218         /* Circle Dp graph. */
00219         for(map<unsigned short, Graph >::iterator dp(p_Dp_graphs.begin()); dp != p_Dp_graphs.end(); dp++)
00220         {
00221                 /* Obtain rule of graph. */
00222                 const Rule *current_rule(&(rules.find(dp->first)->second));
00223                 /* Obtain all non-terminals symbols of the right-side of the rule. */
00224                 vector<const Symbol*> r_non_terminals(current_rule->get_non_terminals_right_side());
00225 
00226                 /* curren_graph = Dp(rule). */
00227                 current_graph = dp->second;
00228 
00229                 /* Circle for join all Down of the symbol right-side. */
00230                 for (size_t i(0); i < r_non_terminals.size(); i++)
00231                 {
00232                         Graph &down_graph(p_Down_graphs.find(r_non_terminals[i]->key())->second);
00233                         Graph merged;
00234                         merge_graph(current_graph, down_graph, merged);
00235                         current_graph.clear();
00236                         current_graph = merged;
00237                 }
00238                 /* In this point: current_graph = Dp(Rule) U down(X1) U....U down(Xn). */
00239 
00240                 /* Project for left symbol of current_rule. */
00241                 project_graph(current_rule->get_left_symbol(), current_graph);
00242 
00243                 /* Modifies the down graph of symbol. */
00244                 Graph &old_down_graph(p_Down_graphs.find(current_rule->get_left_symbol()->key())->second);
00245                 Graph new_down_graph;
00246                 merge_graph(current_graph,old_down_graph,new_down_graph);
00247                 old_down_graph = new_down_graph;
00248                 new_down_graph.clear();
00249                 current_graph.clear();
00250         }
00251         return true;
00252 }

00262 bool Builder_graphs::compute_dcg()
00263 {
00264         const map<unsigned short,Rule> &rules(attr_grammar.get_rules());
00265 
00266         Graph current_graph;
00267         /* Circle Dp graph. */
00268         for(map <unsigned short, Graph>::iterator it(p_Dp_graphs.begin()); it != p_Dp_graphs.end(); it++)
00269         {
00270                 /* Obtain rule of graph. */
00271                 const Rule *current_rule(&(rules.find(it->first)->second));
00272                 /* Obtain all non-terminals symbols of the right-side of the rule. */
00273                 vector<const Symbol*> r_non_terminals(current_rule->get_non_terminals_right_side());
00274                 /* curren_graph = Dp(rule). */
00275                 current_graph = it->second;
00276 
00277                 /* Circle for join all Down of the symbol right-side. */
00278                 for (size_t i(0); i < r_non_terminals.size(); i++)
00279                 {
00280                         Graph &down_graph(p_Down_graphs.find(r_non_terminals[i]->key())->second);
00281                         Graph merged;
00282                         merge_graph(current_graph,down_graph,merged);
00283                         current_graph.clear();
00284                         current_graph = merged;
00285                 }
00286                 /* In this point: current_graph = Dp(Rule) U down(X1) U....U down(Xn). */
00287 
00288                 /* Project for left symbol of current_rule. */
00289                 project_graph(current_rule->get_left_symbol(), current_graph);
00290 
00291                 /* Insert current graph in map of down graph. */
00292                 pair<unsigned short, Graph > new_p(current_rule->key(), current_graph);
00293                 p_Dcg_graphs.insert(new_p);
00294         }
00295         return true;
00296 }
00297 
00301 bool Builder_graphs::combined_inf_contexts(const Rule *rule, Graph &graph, vector< vector<unsigned short> > &inf_context, size_t index_to_combine)
00302 {
00303         static vector<unsigned short> adp_plan;
00304 
00305         if(index_to_combine == inf_context.size())
00306         {
00307                 Graph current_graph(graph);
00308 
00309                 vector<unsigned short> name_adp;
00310 
00311                 /* Adds DP graph's key. */
00312                 name_adp.push_back(rule->key());
00313 
00314                 /* Circle for join all DCG of the symbol right-side. */
00315                 for(size_t i(0); i < adp_plan.size(); i++)
00316                 {
00317                         Graph &dcg_graph(p_Dcg_graphs.find(adp_plan[i])->second);
00318                         Graph merged;
00319                         merge_graph(current_graph, dcg_graph, merged);
00320                         current_graph.clear();
00321                         current_graph = merged;
00322 
00323                         /* Adds DCG graph's key. */
00324                         name_adp.push_back(adp_plan[i]);
00325                 }
00326                 /* In this point: current_graph = Dp(Rule) U dcg(X1) U....U dcg(Xn). */
00327 
00328                 /* Saving the ADP complete in the map. */
00329                 pair<vector<unsigned short>, Graph> new_p(name_adp, current_graph);
00330                 p_Adp_graphs.insert(new_p);
00331         }
00332         else
00333         {
00334                 if (index_to_combine < inf_context.size())
00335                 {
00336                         for(size_t i(0); i < inf_context[index_to_combine].size(); i++)
00337                         {
00338                                 adp_plan.push_back(inf_context[index_to_combine][i]);
00339                                 combined_inf_contexts(rule, graph, inf_context, index_to_combine + 1);
00340                                 adp_plan.pop_back();
00341                         }
00342                 }
00343                 else
00344                 {
00345                         cerr << "ERROR: Index out bounds: combined ADP graphs." << endl;
00346                         return false;
00347                 }
00348         }
00349         return true;
00350 }

00360 bool Builder_graphs::compute_adp_graph()
00361 {
00362         Graph current_graph;
00363         /* Circle Dp graph. */
00364         for(map <unsigned short,Graph>::iterator it(p_Dp_graphs.begin()); it != p_Dp_graphs.end(); it++)
00365         {
00366                 /* Obtain rule of graph. */
00367                 const Rule *current_rule(&(attr_grammar.get_rules().find(it->first)->second));
00368 
00369                 /* Obtain all non-terminals symbols of the right-side of the rule. */
00370                 vector<const Symbol*> r_non_terminals(current_rule->get_non_terminals_right_side());
00371 
00372                 /* curren_graph = Dp(rule). */
00373                 current_graph = it->second;
00374 
00375                 /* Inicializacion del vector de no terminales con todas las reglas en donde son left symbol. */
00376                 vector< vector<unsigned short> > inf_contexts;
00377                 for (size_t i(0); i < r_non_terminals.size(); i++)
00378                 {
00379                         /* Obtain all rule with the left-symbol one right symbol of the current_rule. */
00380                         inf_contexts.push_back(attr_grammar.get_rules_with_left_symbol(r_non_terminals[i]));
00381                 }
00382 
00383                 /* Generates and saves all combinatios of context with these rules. */
00384                 if(!combined_inf_contexts(current_rule, current_graph, inf_contexts, 0))
00385                 {
00386                         return false;
00387                 }
00388         }
00389         return true;
00390 }
00391 
00392 struct cycle_detector: public dfs_visitor<>
00393 {
00394         public:
00395                 cycle_detector(bool& has_cycle, Graph &graph): _has_cycle(has_cycle), _graph_cycle(graph){}
00396 
00397             template <class Edge, class G>
00401                 void examine_edge(Edge u, const G &g)
00402             {
00403                 if(!_has_cycle)
00404                 {
00405                         typename G::vertex_descriptor v1(source(u, g));
00406                         typename G::vertex_descriptor v2(target(u, g));
00407 
00408                         typename property_map<G, vertex_data_t>::const_type props(get(vertex_data_t(), g));
00409                         property_map<Graph, vertex_data_t>::type prop_cycle(get(vertex_data_t(), _graph_cycle));
00410 
00411                         Vertex v1_path(return_vertex(_graph_cycle, props[v1]));
00412                         if (v1_path == USHRT_MAX)
00413                         {
00414                                 v1_path = add_vertex(_graph_cycle);
00415                                         put(prop_cycle, v1_path, props[v1]);
00416                         }
00417 
00418                         Vertex v2_path(return_vertex(_graph_cycle, props[v2]));
00419                                 if (v2_path == USHRT_MAX)
00420                                 {
00421                                         v2_path = add_vertex(_graph_cycle);
00422                                         put(prop_cycle, v2_path, props[v2]);
00423                                 }
00424 
00425                         add_edge(v1_path, v2_path, _graph_cycle);
00426                 }
00427             }
00428 
00429             template <class Edge, class G>
00430             void back_edge(Edge u, const G& g)
00431                 {
00432                         _has_cycle = true;
00433                 }
00434 
00435         protected:
00436                 bool     &_has_cycle;
00437             Graph    &_graph_cycle;
00438 };

00444 bool Builder_graphs::check_cyclic_adp_dependencies()
00445 {
00446         bool cycles_detect(false);
00447         for(map <vector<unsigned short>,Graph>::iterator adp_it(p_Adp_graphs.begin()); adp_it != p_Adp_graphs.end(); adp_it++)
00448         {
00449                 bool has_cycle(false);
00450                 Graph g_cycle;
00451                 cycle_detector vis(has_cycle, g_cycle);
00452                 boost::depth_first_search(adp_it->second, visitor(vis));
00453 
00454                 cycles_detect = (cycles_detect || has_cycle);
00455 
00456                 if(has_cycle)
00457                 {
00458                         /* Saving the ADP subgraph with cycle in the map. */
00459                         pair<vector<unsigned short>, Graph> new_p(adp_it->first, g_cycle);
00460                         p_Adp_subgraphs_cyclics.insert(new_p);
00461                 }
00462         }
00463         return cycles_detect;
00464 }
00465 
00469 void Builder_graphs::complete_dp_graphs()
00470 {
00471         const map<unsigned short, Rule> &rules(attr_grammar.get_rules());
00472 
00473         for(map<unsigned short,Graph >::iterator dp(p_Dp_graphs.begin()); dp != p_Dp_graphs.end(); dp++)
00474         {
00475                 const Rule &rule(rules.find(dp->first)->second);
00476                 Graph attr_symb(attr_vertex_graphs.find(rule.get_left_symbol()->key())->second);
00477                 Graph new_with_attr_symb;
00478                 merge_graph(dp->second, attr_symb, new_with_attr_symb);
00479                 dp->second = new_with_attr_symb;
00480         }
00481 }

00486 bool Builder_graphs::save_dp_graphs(const string path_output) const
00487 {
00488         const map<unsigned short, Rule> &rules(attr_grammar.get_rules());
00489 
00490         string path_out(path_output);
00491         path_out.append(PATH_OUTPUT_DP);
00492 
00493         if(!clean_output_folder(path_out))
00494         {
00495                 return false;
00496         }
00497 
00498         for(map <unsigned short,Graph>::const_iterator it(p_Dp_graphs.begin()); it != p_Dp_graphs.end(); it++)
00499         {
00500                 string name_graph("Dependency Graph of rule ");
00501                 const Rule *current_rule(&(rules.find(it->first)->second));
00502                 name_graph.append(cleaning_tabs(current_rule->to_string_not_eqs()));
00503 
00504                 size_t count_vertex(num_vertices(it->second));
00505                 string names[count_vertex];
00506                 generate_names_instance(it->second,names,count_vertex);
00507                 print_graph(it->second,path_out ,FILE_DP_GRAPH, name_graph,names,"ellipse");
00508         }
00509         return true;
00510 }
00514 bool Builder_graphs::save_down_graphs(const string path_output) const
00515 {
00516         string path_out(path_output);
00517         path_out.append(PATH_OUTPUT_DOWN);
00518 
00519         if(!clean_output_folder(path_out))
00520         {
00521                 return false;
00522         }
00523 
00524         for(map <string,Graph>::const_iterator it(p_Down_graphs.begin()); it != p_Down_graphs.end(); it++)
00525         {
00526                 string name_graph("Graph Down(");
00527                 name_graph.append(it->first);
00528                 name_graph.append(")");
00529 
00530                 size_t count_vertex(num_vertices(it->second));
00531                 string names[count_vertex];
00532                 generate_names_attr(it->second,names,count_vertex);
00533                 print_graph(it->second,path_out.c_str(),FILE_DOWN_GRAPH,name_graph,names,"ellipse");
00534         }
00535         return true;
00536 }

00552         for(map <unsigned short,Graph>::const_iterator it(p_Dcg_graphs.begin()); it != p_Dcg_graphs.end(); it++)

00554                 string name_graph("DCG Graph of rule ");

00556                 name_graph.append(cleaning_tabs(current_rule->to_string_not_eqs()));
00557                 name_graph.append(" with symbol ");
00558                 name_graph.append(current_rule->get_left_symbol()->get_name());
00559 
00560                 size_t count_vertex(num_vertices(it->second));
00561                 string names[count_vertex];
00562                 generate_names_instance(it->second,names,count_vertex);
00563                 print_graph(it->second,path_out.c_str(),FILE_DCG_GRAPH,name_graph,names,"ellipse");

00570 bool Builder_graphs::save_adp_graphs(const string path_output) const
00571 {
00572         const map<unsigned short, Rule> &rules(attr_grammar.get_rules());
00573 
00574         string path_out(path_output);
00575         path_out.append(PATH_OUTPUT_ADP);
00576 
00577         if(!clean_output_folder(path_out))
00578         {
00579                 return false;
00580         }
00581 
00582         for(map <vector<unsigned short>,Graph>::const_iterator it(p_Adp_graphs.begin()); it != p_Adp_graphs.end(); it++)
00583         {
00584                 string name_graph("ADP Graph of rule ");
00585                 const Rule *rule(&(rules.find(it->first[0])->second));
00586                 name_graph.append(cleaning_tabs(rule->to_string_not_eqs()));
00587 
00588                 name_graph.append(write_inf_context(it->first));
00589                 name_graph.append(".");
00590 
00591                 size_t count_vertex(num_vertices(it->second));
00592                 string names[count_vertex];
00593                 generate_names_instance(it->second,names,count_vertex);
00594                 print_graph(it->second,path_out.c_str(), FILE_ADP_GRAPH, name_graph,names,"ellipse");
00595         }
00596         return true;
00597 }

00602 bool Builder_graphs::save_all_graphs(const string path_output) const
00603 {
00604         string path_out(path_output);
00605         path_out.append(PATH_OUTPUT_GRAPHS);
00606 
00607         if(
00608                 clean_output_folder(path_out) &&
00609                 save_dp_graphs(path_out) &&
00610                 save_down_graphs(path_out) &&
00611                 save_dcg_graphs(path_out) &&
00612                 save_adp_graphs(path_out)
00613         )
00614         {
00615                 return true;
00616         }
00617         return false;
00618 }

00620 bool Builder_graphs::save_cyclic_graphs(const string path_output) const
00621 {
00622         const map<unsigned short, Rule> &rules(attr_grammar.get_rules());
00623 
00624         string path_out(path_output);
00625         path_out.append(PATH_OUTPUT_GRAPHS);
00626 
00627         if(!clean_output_folder(path_out))
00628         {
00629                 return false;
00630         }
00631         path_out.append(PATH_OUTPUT_CYCLIC);
00632         if(!clean_output_folder(path_out))
00633         {
00634                 return false;
00635         }
00636 
00637         for(map <vector<unsigned short>,Graph>::const_iterator it(p_Adp_subgraphs_cyclics.begin()); it != p_Adp_subgraphs_cyclics.end(); it++)
00638         {
00639                 string name_graph("ADP Subgraph cyclic of rule ");
00640                 const Rule *rule(&(rules.find(it->first[0])->second));
00641                 name_graph.append(cleaning_tabs(rule->to_string_not_eqs()));
00642 
00643                 name_graph.append(write_inf_context(it->first));
00644                 name_graph.append(".");
00645 
00646                 size_t count_vertex(num_vertices(it->second));
00647                 string names[count_vertex];
00648                 generate_names_instance(it->second,names,count_vertex);
00649                 print_graph(it->second,path_out.c_str(), FILE_ADP_SUBGRAPH_CYCLIC, name_graph,names,"ellipse");
00650         }
00651         return true;
